comment: General Qassem Soleimani has killed or badly wounded thousands of Americans over an extended period of time , and was plotting to kill many more ... but got caught ! He was directly and indirectly responsible for the death of millions of people , including the recent large number ...

            :ARG2 (c3 / catch-03

            :ARG1-of (d3 / direct-02
                  :polarity -)))
